Appearance

Tabs

An obsidian plugin

Made by Huajin

Document
Github

Sections

Tabs organize content into multiple sections and allow users to navigate between them.

Simple syntax

You can create a tabs component in your note by tabs code block.

Editor

Edit tab content directly without touching the source content in code block.

Customizable

Customize the color, positon, border, padding, and more

Draggable

You can quickly change the order of tabs by dragging and dropping.

Plugins support

Work well with other plugins such as Dataview, Tasks, Icon Shortcodes, etc.
